website_summaries.verdict: This unique inflatable will be a welcome addition to your outdoor holiday decor, and the price is decent.
pros: Cute 5-foot waving gingerbread man holding a candy cane
Brightly colored with a happy face
Pops up without a lot of work
cons: Somewhat unstable in windy conditions, and it's prone to bending and tipping

customer_reviews.title: Cute 5 ft Gingerbread Man
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, a CUTE 5 ft Gingerbread Man Inflatable. The lighting inside is really bright. Lighter than most inflatables in nearby neighborhood. Set up was super quick. It only took about a minute or two to inflate. This package comes with everything that you need to stabilize him. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a Christmas inflatable decoration that wasn't too expensive, came across this one and bought it. So happy with this purchase, inflates quickly, has bright lights inside, it's just like the photo online, looks great in front of our home.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely adorable...its worth the money better dan wat i expected i must say
customer_reviews.author: galwaygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Depending on weather conditions, some extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Depending on weather conditions, some extra paracord might need to be added to his sides to stake him in front and to the back. In addition to the cord and stakes that come from his sides and sides of feet. To keep him from blowing forwards or backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaFavers

customer_reviews.title: Inflates quickly. Seems sturdy. Add rocks to the feet or stake him down securely.
customer_reviews.text: He inflates quickly but won't stand upright unless you have him staked securely to the ground (he inflates but stays lying down). I put a few fist-sized rocks inside at the feet to anchor him so he can stand up. Nicely lit. Surviving outside just fine so far (some rain). Good stitching and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holiday perfection
customer_reviews.text: I am the owner of many holiday season blowups, adding the gingerbread man to my yard , generated more attention than I thought I had multiple cars stopped to ask me where I got him highly recommend for a little bling to your holiday decorations it will be noticed and stands out above and beyond I only wish he could be a little bigger and taller to fit in with the rest of the decorations highly recommend to add to your Christmas display and asking the manufacture if they could make one for Thanksgiving thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. You just keep it plugged in to blow and light up, good quality for price. 5ft at the very top of hat and stands.
customer_reviews.author: JOE PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Addition To Our Decorations
customer_reviews.text: I added this to our lawn's decorations, and I placed the lighted "Merry Christmas" sign right in front of it. (See the Merry Christmas sign here on amazon.) It looks great and is warm and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Christine LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: Meh, I was really hoping for better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planning to put it outside for the holidays, but the material is so thin that all you can see from the street is a weird looking figure with a bright light in it so we decided to keep it inside. I also thought this would be a golden brown color like a gingerbread cookie, but I received a dark brown one. For the price, it's ok however since I couldn't use it the way I intended it was kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: D. and M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective after the first rain
customer_reviews.text: It's really cut and I was excited to get it. After our first rain, however, it omitted a very loud humming sound. It wasn't plugged in until the day after the rain ended. I'm so embarrassed by how loud it is now, I took it off of our lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It lasted a season...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inflatable a year ago and it held up for 1 season, but this week after an overnight rain, I woke up to find that the Gingerbread Man was toast. Totally shorted out. Waited a day to completely dry out, took apart the blower and checked all the wiring and leads, and sadly, still did not inflate or light up when I plugged it in. A shame because it did look really nice for a few uses, but for the price, it should be able to withstand a few rain showers.
customer_reviews.author: Howie C.

customer_reviews.title: A hit with soeone who LOVES inflatavles.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, 7, loves inflatables. He is a major fan of the Gemmy brand in particular and scoffs at other brands. But I took a chance on this gingerbread man because there were good reviews and it is cute. Well, my grandson gave a big thumbs up to this. He especially liked the internal lights. If he recommends this, so do I. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy loves turtles

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the $
customer_reviews.text: This was a great lawn display for Christmas. I did have to put bricks in the toes to help in stand better. Unfortunately, if it rains during the day when it’s collapsed, you have to remove the water before it will stand again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were more stable
customer_reviews.text: Cute inflatable but tips over often. Supposed to be waving at the people passing by but instead looks like he had too much to drink as we often find it face down. Hooking straps needed on front and back of inflatable to help stabilize it. Otherwise, a cute product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Mr Hanky
customer_reviews.text: The headline tells you what this looks like in person. I tossed it in the trash. It's not as cute in person and looks like Mr Hanky for South Park. You cannot tell its supposed to be a gingerbread man.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Jolly Gingerbread my neighbors love him!
customer_reviews.text: Inflated within seconds. Bright colors, and good bright light. Led lights! Happy face. Will buy again from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Strong

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: He’s survived two windy Oklahoma Christmases with no tears or holes. Did add 2 more hooks this year to help anchor him to the ground and he fell down less. Last year I was adjusting him almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Tips easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like the inflatable but, even with the stakes, the wind would push it over causing it to face plant. It does have weighted bean bags in the feet. I solved the tipping problem by putting it closer to the house and tying the arm that sticks up to my stair rails.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is so darn cute!! We have never purchased a lawn decoration and are very pleased with this. Since we have titled this year as “Gingerbread Cookie Christmas” it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I got two. Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size, and they work really well. Easy to put up, straight out of the box! Also super easy to put away. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MommyBeeof3

customer_reviews.title: Cute while it lasted, less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Fan died after 2nd year of use (Christmas only for about 25 days and only from 6pm-10pm) Fan also wasn't very strong, so even the slightest gust of wind, snow, rain, would flatten this inflatable. Invest in another one -
customer_reviews.author: Leaping Trout

customer_reviews.title: Cute but would not stay upright
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and tall, but it would not inflate unless I held it up or maneuvered the fan into the correct position. I don’t live in an environment with high winds or inclement weather either. I had to move the stakes several times as it would not keep upright.
customer_reviews.author: TJ S.

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable fit right in with my others. Best of all was the brightness of the LEDs. I’m slowly replacing my older ones because of their dim lights.
customer_reviews.author: A. Perez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and look/motor stopped working and was sent new product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the gingerbread man, very cute, but stopped working in a couple of weeks, thankfully before the return window. New product sent out promptly. I hope it lasts when I use it again next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the holiday
customer_reviews.text: Funny he came as a very dark brown gingerbread man. Like he had been left in the oven too long. But he was cute and durable. Would buy him again.
customer_reviews.author: virgina Corona

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Absoltuely adorable! We had to stake it down becuase it is windy and would fall over but that is minor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Well made yard decor
customer_reviews.text: This comes with 4 stakes and 4 cords to tie it down. It has withstood strong winds and icy rain so far. The light inside illuminates it well.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this gingerbread man blow-up for the Christmas holiday! My 18-month grandson loved it! Durable, too, since he loved to tackle it with a big hug!! I kept it inside for him to enjoy! Great size blow-up and worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great inflatable at a great price. Just plug it in and your set. Comes with strings to attach to railing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay up to flimsy very weak motor
customer_reviews.text: The gingerbread man would not stay standing even with little to no wind. The light was not very bright and I spent the whole time it was up going constantly having to put it upright we did extra tie downs and everything possible and did not help. Water would get in also. Weak motor bought a different type same price blows up excellent Cute but very poorly made and am not putting back up
customer_reviews.author: Anne Schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Busted in snow
customer_reviews.text: We only got to use this a few times. It got snowed on and the next day didn’t work. Husband thinks the snow somehow messed up the wiring. You’d think a holiday blow up would be able to withstand all sorts of weather!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Cute and festive
customer_reviews.text: So cute and a great size. The strings did slide off the stakes a few times (which we easily put back on), but that’s the only negative. Overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Item as described and works fine
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit pricey but so far has stayed inflated and running an that was the most important requirement. Was the only gingerbread man we could find for our gingerbread house display.
customer_reviews.author: WM8C

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this guy! So glad I bought him! The light inside is wonderfully bright.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, cute, water-resistant and very quiet. Comes with three hooks and ropes you can tie it down with (the wind will topple it over if it’s not securely tied down to sth). Worked great and easy to stow until next year!
customer_reviews.author: PsychoBunny

customer_reviews.title: Blowup gingerbread man
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Held up real well through a hard wind we had. And it's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Looks good from the street
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my new favorite decoration easy to put up. Looks great from the street
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun holiday yard decoration!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect addition to an existing yard display or suitable to stand alone!
customer_reviews.author: ShopMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so cute !
customer_reviews.text: Plug in and it fills with air in seconds. As easy as that. It’s great in quality and provides my son with tons of fun. He just loves his gingerbread man.
customer_reviews.author: KPM

customer_reviews.title: He’s a cutie pie
customer_reviews.text: Stood by the front door Easy set up Worked really well
customer_reviews.author: Cat3

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY......
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it even got one star is because it made me pick one. Do not waste your time or money on products from this company the fans are not strong enough to inflate the product properly. Or the power on them does not work at all. I bought three of them this year and all three of them have had to go back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute lawn inflatable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with our other lawn inflatable. We've been using it for several weeks and so far, it's been great! It's really adorable, stays up well and the light is bright!
customer_reviews.author: TheCaravanClub

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Looks great and held up all winter.
customer_reviews.author: VI

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. It was awkwardly sewn and lit up very strangely. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute addition to our holiday outdoor collection! I just wish it came with more than two tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exactly one year ago, and initially, it looked great! I set it up this year and after a few days, the motor went completely dead. So this worked literally for just one Christmas season. Don't waste your time with this brand (Joiedomi) of inflatables.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The cutest gingerbread in my yard this Christmas. Durable with all the strings to hold it down. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: like all inflatables you have to adjust them from time to time
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but smaller then the picture makes it seem.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It looked great and worked great at first but after about 2 weeks the motor just stopped working. It sits deflated on my lawn amongst all the Xmas decorations. Plugged in. No tears. Just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: kristy briles

customer_reviews.title: Needs  better anchor points in front/rear
customer_reviews.text: Tips over too easily because front/rear anchor points are placed too high on product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus G

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but indid expect it a litte bigger. Did not look like the size they advertised
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: In perfect weather it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The stakes that came with are a joke and could not hold it down in the wind. So aftermarket stakes are needed and any amount of snow will lay it over. Otherwise in a pristine weather conditions it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Lavery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It arrived earlier then expected. Itinflates very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Klking

customer_reviews.title: Cute Inflatable and can withstand the outdoor elements.
customer_reviews.text: This happy Gingerbread Man withstood some really crazy weather conditions. He survived heavy winds and rain and remains in top notch condition. I have a very dark front yard and although a touch dim, he was visible. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Ho Ho Ho
customer_reviews.text: Loved the gingerbread man! Just like advertised. Good price for product
customer_reviews.author: julie s

customer_reviews.title: sad to say it lasted less than 1 season
customer_reviews.text: Had it in the yard for last Christmas and that's it. I have several yard blowups that have made it past several Christmas's but not this one. I believe it is an adapter issue but can not test cause the adapter is unique and not like any of my other yard decorations.
customer_reviews.author: NYer in VA

customer_reviews.title: Good on lights bill !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kids love it good price fast shipping 😊thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was beat to heck, but gingerbread man works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect! Easy setup, well made, and looks great! A perfect addition to my outdoor Christmas decorations!
customer_reviews.author: jsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not the best structural design.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but the ankle area is not wide enough to support the top of the decoration if there is any air movement at all. My gingerbread man spent the holidays with his face in the grass...very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today. I’m currently deployed to Afghanistan and ordered this inflatable gingerbread man to decorate the office. I was excited until I plugged up the inflatable man and it did not inflate! I was highly disappointed!! What a waste of my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Natascha March

customer_reviews.title: Don't bite this gingerbread man!
customer_reviews.text: It will be so cute in my yard next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Cute BUT arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and will be displayed in my yard this Christmas, but it may have a hole in it because it doesn't look like it is inflating right. Either that or the motor isn't strong enough. I just took it out of the package today and set it up. A little upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shipley

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be good quality and durable. We haven't had any issues with it so far this season. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price. Last whole season.
customer_reviews.text: We put it out for a little more than a month and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great is a little load but it’s an outdoor unit
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: IT'S SHORTER THAN ME
customer_reviews.text: The item is pretty however, its not 5feet tall more like 4 feet plus its not bright.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was super excited to get it but it lasted 2 weeks exactly and died. Will not power on at all. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described in the picture my family loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bright light, thin material but it's holding up fine. Next time I will get a taller onf
customer_reviews.author: Momofthreeonthego

customer_reviews.title: It is a great size and will use it outdoor next year
customer_reviews.text: I used it indoors for a gingerbread party. It is a great size and will use it outdoor next year.
customer_reviews.author: lisac

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 minutes
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for approximately 4 minutes before the motor gave out. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: very thin material, used it just the past season and garbage
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: Died in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Fan died in 3 weeks. I don’t expect it to last forever but 3 weeks of use is unacceptable. Note: other inflatables next to it have been fine
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Truly in the spirit of the season
customer_reviews.text: One of my many for xmas - just a great add on
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: I think this was a very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put up my Christmas decorations but can't wait to see what this looks like.
customer_reviews.author: joanne farmer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk first one would not inflate sent back for a replacement worked for about five minutes and quit working again but you get what you pay for. Both sent back and got a refund
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Buy it its worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new decoration it is soo adorable I definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: N.Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: Another cute addition to the lawn. I love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ball

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay up Wants to keep falling over Motor not super strong
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gingerbread Man!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with him!!! Well made and durable, thankyou for a product that was better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected . Nice quality and fast shipping .
customer_reviews.author: 2010LoriQ

customer_reviews.title: Hit at the party!
customer_reviews.text: Love this guy! Great quality and can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over baked
customer_reviews.text: It was very dark it didn’t match the other gingerbread men in display
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Newland

customer_reviews.title: What a terrific item!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w the color, the overall presentation. Easy set up, easy breakdown. Will be a terrific addition to our Christmas fund raiser
customer_reviews.author: Pat P.

customer_reviews.title: Look's great
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to set up,comes with everything to tie it down.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! Especially my son great product. Only issue wished the lights a bit brighter
customer_reviews.author: Royer M. Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Christmas Decoration
customer_reviews.text: We loved this inflatable gingerbread man. Great price. We had to readjust the anchors a few times because he fell over.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Was not noisy at all
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it was not too big it was just right
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Cake

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have over 30 inflatables and this one is by far the best for the money
customer_reviews.author: Rose M Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gingerbread Man
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble super cute and bright. Went well with my other decorations.
customer_reviews.author: GlamGirl13

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell on this product as we will ...
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell on this product as we will see how it holds up when we use it for the first time 2018 season
customer_reviews.author: Pat DiFiore

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This gingerbread man is not 5 ft tall it’s more like 3ft. Cute but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: melissa jaworowski

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Placed it by my front porch to greet my guest. He really seemed to wave at them. Was so cute. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Traci L. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A very nice value and it shows nicely at night time
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Gingerbread man
customer_reviews.text: It didnt even make one holiday season before it wouldnt inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Eck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Christmas Decorations
customer_reviews.text: It was durable. It survived a rainstorm, snow, and heavy winds.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Neatest yard decoration
customer_reviews.text: We love our newest Christmas decoration. The Gingerbread man adds thill the spirit of the season
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best Door Greeter
customer_reviews.text: Love this guy! True to size, no issues with the lighting or staying inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Grant S.

product_meta.title: Joiedomi JO-GM01 Yard Decoration 5ft Self-Inflatable Gingerbread Man with Candy Canes Perfect for Wavin, White
feature_bullets: Led light up giant Christmas gingerbread man inflatable includes a 5 foot inflatable gingerbread man with a fixed sand bag, 2 Fasten ropes, 4 ground stakes and a plug with UL certification.
Led swirling lights built inside. Light up in the evening for the Best attraction to neighbors and guests.
Very easy to use. Everything pops up in a minute! Superior quality. Deluxe set.
Perfect for Christmas indoor/ outdoor yard garden decorations; Christmas event decoration, Christmas Night event, party favor Christmas proper, classroom decorations and more.
Child safe: non-toxic. Meet us standard. Safety test approved.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars392 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
